Name.label: Localized lichen myxedematosus with mixed features of different subtypes

TextSection.Contents: Localized lichen myxedematosus (LM) with mixed features of different subtypes is a form of atypical lichen myxedematosus (see this term), characterized by mixed features of the 5 subtypes of localized LM which are: discrete papular LM, acral persistent papular mucinosis, self-healing papular mucinosis, papular mucinosis of infancy, and nodular LM (see these terms).
